description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in HT Plugins HT Mega – Absolute Addons for WPBakery Page Builder allows Stored XSS. This issue affects HT Mega – Absolute Addons for WPBakery Page Builder: from n/a through 1.0.8.

product.name: HT Mega – Absolute Addons for WPBakery Page Builder
